## blockRendering.ConstantProvider.FIELD\_TEXT\_HEIGHT property

Height of text. This constant is dynamically set in \`\`<!-- -->setFontConstants\_<!-- -->\`\` to be the height of the text based on the font used.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
FIELD_TEXT_HEIGHT: number;
```
